frontend/src/components/UnauthorizedAcce: Empty file with no content or exports.

frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Page for recording employee work hours, offering month/year selection and two tabs: bulk monthly entry and daily bulk entry.

frontend/src/pages/EmployeesPage.tsx: Page that lists employees in a searchable card grid with options to add, edit, delete, and view individual employee folders.

frontend/src/pages/MonthlyBankSalariesPa: Page for managing monthly bank salaries with month/year selectors and three tabs: bulk entry, individual per-employee entry, and a view tab.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Page for recording and viewing employee payments, showing cash/bank totals for the selected month/year and tabs for bulk entry and payment history view.
frontend/src/pages/PayrollPage.tsx: Payroll calculation page that displays summary cards (total salaries, cash/bank payments, remaining) and per-employee payroll data for a selected month/year.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines all shared frontend TypeScript interfaces including Employee, WorkDay, PaymentRecord, MonthlyBankSalary, LeaveDay, PayrollData, and ChangeHistoryEntry.
